title: Strange Brew
summaries: The Strange Brew is a recovery potion that is purchased from the Skeleton Merchant during certain moon phases for 5 SC. The Strange Brew restores 70–120 health, inflicts 40–70 seconds of Potion Sickness, and has a 61/100 (61%) chance to grant up to 4 seconds of damage immunity upon being used.

statistics.Tooltip:
Side Effects May Include:
-Unpredictable Healing
-Inconsistent Potion Sickness
-Brief Periods of Inexplicable Invulnerability
'It looks and smells terrible'
statistics.Buy: 5 SC
statistics.Sell: 1 SC
